items.a: I’m a Data & QA Engineer (she/her) pivoting into Data/Business Analyst roles. I combine SQL/Python analysis and dashboarding with a QA mindset to validate data, clarify requirements, and ship reliable insights.

SQL, Python (Pandas/NumPy), Power BI (DAX), Tableau, Excel (Power Query), Data modeling (star schema), Requirements & user stories, Acceptance criteria, Stakeholder communication, QA automation (Cypress, Postman, JMeter).
Data Analyst, Business Analyst, or hybrid QA/Data roles where I can turn messy data into clear recommendations, define KPIs, and improve product quality with measurable impact.
Cooking, listening to music, watching movies, and cafe hopping.
